title: Kronecker–Weber theorem
summary: In algebraic number theory, it can be shown that every cyclotomic field is an abelian extension of the rational number field Q, having Galois group of the form ( Z / n Z ) × {\displaystyle (\mathbb {Z} /n\mathbb {Z} )^{\times }} . The Kronecker–Weber theorem provides a partial converse: every finite abelian extension of Q is contained within some cyclotomic field.
